title: Leaver for the game crashing "not able to connect to internet bug" and then wasn't able to log in.
body: I received a leaver for my game crashing and then wasn't able to log back in. I was wondering if there was a way to reverse then as it is very frustrating.

replies.body: I noticed that we've been having a few login issues recently, and depending on what exactly happened we might be able to help. I can't do much here on the boards, but reach out to our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to look at your account and see what we can do there!
